description: This file defines a custom Checkbox React component using Radix UI primitives and lucide-react icon. It provides a styled checkbox that can be reused across the project.

classes.name: Checkbox
classes.description: A React forwardRef component that renders a styled checkbox using Radix UI primitives.

methods.name: Checkbox
methods.description: A React component for a custom styled checkbox, forwarding ref and accepting props for customization.
